edge.helper

Class EdgeFTP

  • java.lang.Object
    • edge.helper.EdgeFTP
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    EdgeUploader

    public class EdgeFTP
extends java.lang.Object
implements EdgeUploader
    Interface implementation of the EdgeUploader class. This class handles file uploads using FTP. The class will check the database for the user's FTP settings and tries to connect to the FTP server.

    • Field Detail

      • tempPrefix

        private final java.lang.String tempPrefix
        the prefix every temporary folder gets. the temporary folder name is generated like this: <prefix>-<unix timestamp>

    • Constructor Detail

      • EdgeFTP

        public EdgeFTP(java.lang.String host,
               java.lang.String port,
               java.lang.String user,
               java.lang.String pass)
        Parameters:
        host - the ftp server host address (IP addresses are supported too)
        port - String the port where the FTP client runs. (defaults to 21 when null)
        user - the user which EdgePMT will use for login on the server side
        pass - the password of the user

      • EdgeFTP

        public EdgeFTP(User user)
        Constructs a new EdgeFTP instance with an user object. This constructor tries to get the required FTP settings from the user's config.
        Parameters:
        user - Any user object which has valid FTP settings stored in the database

    • Method Detail

      • checkConnection

        public boolean checkConnection()
        this method tries to connect and login to the FTP server using the given credentials.
        Returns:
        true if connection went successfully or false if not.

        private boolean fileExists(java.lang.String fileName)

      • listFiles

        private it.sauronsoftware.ftp4j.FTPFile[] listFiles()
        gets a list of files in the current directory. reports error messages when EdgeFTP couldn't obtain the filelist is obtained every cycle. be aware of possible application hang ups because of high cpu & network usage.
        Returns:
        a FTPFile[] array of files in the current working directory

      • _addVersionToFileName

        private java.lang.String _addVersionToFileName(java.io.File file,
                                               int version)
        adds a version number to the fileName. if the user wants to upload test.csv but a test.csv file already exists in the current directory EdgeFTP will rename the file to: test-2.csv EdgeFTP will increment the counter until a suitable name was found and returns the new fileName afterwards
        Parameters:
        file - the filename which has a valid extension
        version - the versioning of the file
        Returns:
        the new fileName with the right version attached.
